page.title: 20BEACH AMENITIES INTERVIEW
page.content: Tourist in a coastal area: The tourist was interviewed at Cullercoats amusements.She had arrived here by car,and she came from Tynemouth.She said Cullercoats was a good area for tourists because of the hot weather and discos.The tourists should have a proper place to meet.She had visited the area before and enjoyed the nightlife and castle.On the beach she swims and walks.She used all the facilities except the swimming pool. Resident Of North East Area(not coast): He arrived by car and thought the arcades,pools and golf were good for visitors.The hotels could be improved. The problems are the place is too crowded.He came to go to the Park Hotel.On the beach he sunbathed,swam and played football,using the sandy part all the time.When he comes he only uses the Park Hotel and the beach.
